author: Special Correspondent
text: About 4,500 people participated in a special medical camp organised at Anaiyur in Sivakasi panchayat union as part of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa’s 68{+t}{+h}birthday celebrations on Saturday. Minister for Information and Special Programme Implementation K. T. Rajendra Balaji, who inaugurated the camp, explained the various schemes implemented by the State government for the wellbeing of people.
title: Free medical camp
